Class PouchDbSingleton

The PouchDB-based implementation of a Singleton.

Constructors

constructor

  • new PouchDbSingleton(type: Type, storageEngine: PouchDbStorage, name: string, id: string, key: string, refMode: boolean): PouchDbSingleton

  • Overrides PouchDbStorageProvider.constructor

    • Defined in src/runtime/storage/pouchdb/pouch-db-singleton.ts:39

    Create a new PouchDbSingleton.

    Parameters

    • type: Type

      the underlying type for this singleton.

    • storageEngine: PouchDbStorage

      a reference back to the PouchDbStorage, used for baseStorageKey calls.

    • name: string

      appears unused.

    • id: string

      see base class.

    • key: string

      the storage key for this collection.

    • refMode: boolean

    Returns PouchDbSingleton
